rules_text:
Whenever you attack with this creature and exactly one other creature, add {G}{G}{G}. Until end of turn, you don't lose this mana as steps and phases end.
{2}{G}: This creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
flavor_text:

—The Architect[/i]
